extendedInfo.description: Play Pinochle on your android phone. Place a bid, show your meld, and capture the counters in this fast paced card game. 1.0.3 fixes pass bug1.0.1 has fixes for droid and nexus onePlease provide any feedback to support@bytesequencing.com

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Easy to use and stable. Could use some tougher computer players, but overall it works great. I play quite often.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not even good
reviews.comment: After years of playing double deck pinochle this single deck version just doesn\'t cut it.  I can\'t even remember how to bid right with single deck let alone the bidding and the partner bidding is crappy at best. We need a double deck version like that available with the iphone!
reviews.author: David Kramer

reviews.title: Must be better
reviews.comment: This is a one star implementation of a five star game, for the following reasons.  1.  I am a poor player on my best days, and I win every game I play against this AI. 2.  There is no way to change the ability of the AI
reviews.author: Rob Walker

reviews.title: Okay but...
reviews.comment: 1. No Double Marriage points? 2. The computer goes set too often, making it easy to win 3. Sometimes the little circle that indicates the dealer covers up the number of counters  Other than these things, I think the app is pretty good
reviews.author: Kayla Doerr

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Good game, love it. But it need a few changes, when all points are collected in a single hand that is called a head-rub, meaning the game is over. Also when all the points are collected you should not lose any points. I wish the game could be saved and continued. My new rate is a 3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not too bad
reviews.comment: I\'d give five if my ai partner wouldn\'t hold out on cards I need. Playability is awesome.
reviews.author: Ron Cooper

reviews.title: Can\'t Even See The Cards!!
reviews.comment: I am giving a one star to a five-star game. You cannot even see the cards so you can\'t bid because the bidding screen covers most of the cards. How are you supposed to bid if you cannot see the cards??!!
reviews.author: Michael M

reviews.title: Could be much better
reviews.comment: The good: I love playing single deck pinochle so I use this app to get my daily fix when bored.   The bad: the computers do not play very well and are pretty bad at leading bids.  The partner often chooses trump in suits that it has no aces or tens. Bidding also remains very low so the poor playing often meets the bids, making this game not much of a challenge.
reviews.author: Jeff Jensen

reviews.title: So-So
reviews.comment: I\'m really enjoying that there is a pinochle game out there to play.  As mentioned in previous posts - the AI users aren\'t very skilled.  They quite often hold cards I need when I win the bid and they never seem to \'get it\' that they should generally hold a trump for last hand - they\'re always coming out with something like a 9 of an off suit.  I\'ve also noticed that there is a glitch with the meld - not all of the cards that count are laid down.  For example;  I just played a round and the opponent laid down a 10 K Q J 9 9 in trump....  no Ace!!  Yet the first card he played out was the Ace.  I\'ve seen this glitch happen many times, various scenarios.  All the points get counted, just the cards don\'t display in the meld.
reviews.author: Julie Clark

reviews.title: Very frustrating.
reviews.comment: The strategy for this pinochle app is clearly incorrect in regards of what cards to pass your partner. I can understand lousy passing when you have a poor passing hand, but on numerous occasions my computer partner did not pass me a one card hit for a rope...even when he had double queens. Additionally, when the computer partner took the bid, he would pass me aces when he could have had aces around. Very frustrating.
reviews.author: Rachel Haman

reviews.title: Stupid AI
reviews.comment: Could someone develop a three handed, two deck, no nines, kiddy pinochle game please! I would even pay for it :-(
reviews.author: Ausitn Metcalfe

reviews.title: AI is horrible
reviews.comment: Game works but that\'s about where the good stops. AI seems to be random as in its plays don\'t make sense. I called hearts trump. Why did my computer team mate pass me spades when he had hearts? Deleted.
reviews.author: David Haeffner

reviews.title: Needs to stay open...
reviews.comment: Fine implementation but it is not good that an interruption causing the app to close ends the game.
reviews.author: Evan K

reviews.title: Need save option
reviews.comment: All of my other card games I can save mid-game... not this one, once you exit bye bye game, then you have to start a new one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app
reviews.author: Kathleen Griffin

reviews.title: Terrible changes
reviews.comment: Loved it before changes  speed is either too slow or too fast backround color has a pattern that hurts my eyes and card size in hand is too small.
reviews.author: Carol Hicks

reviews.title: Addicting... awesome
reviews.comment: Hey great app... I would suggest a bigger deck of cards.. I\'m accustomed a plane with 20 cards.. but this is the best thing to the real thing....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 stars because u r the only pinochle game!!
reviews.author: Jakjds Hakjds

reviews.comment: Good game
reviews.author: Scott Tilleman

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: This game will give you your pinochle fix. However the partner ATI is horrible and desperately needs to be fixed: Your partner always plays poorly and bids poorly. Passing by your partner is awful also.
reviews.author: Steven Ballard
